verses.verse: וְאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh, now these שְׁמוֹת֙ <S%H8034><s%> she-mOt Now these [are] the names בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel הַבָּאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> hab-ba-'Im which came מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-ye-mah; into Egypt אֵ֣ת <S%H854><s%> 'et with יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, with Jacob אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man וּבֵית֖וֹ <S%H1004><s%> u-vei-To and his household בָּֽאוּ׃ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u. came
רְאוּבֵ֣ן <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven Reuben שִׁמְע֔וֹן <S%H8095><s%> shim-'on, Simeon לֵוִ֖י <S%H3878><s%> le-Vi Levi וִיהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> vi-hu-Dah. and Judah
יִשָּׂשכָ֥ר <S%H3485><s%> yis-so-sh-Char Issachar זְבוּלֻ֖ן <S%H2074><s%> ze-vu-Lun Zebulun וּבְנְיָמִֽן׃ <S%H1144><s%> u-ve-ne-ya-Min and Benjamin
דָּ֥ן <S%H1835><s%> dan Dan וְנַפְתָּלִ֖י <S%H5321><s%> ve-naf-ta-Li and Naphtali גָּ֥ד <S%H1410><s%> gad Gad וְאָשֵֽׁר׃ <S%H836><s%> ve-'a-Sher. and Asher

וַֽיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All נֶ֛פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh And all the souls יֹצְאֵ֥י <S%H3318><s%> yo-tze-'Ei that came out יֶֽרֶךְ־ <S%H3409><s%> ye-rech- of the loins יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko of Jacob שִׁבְעִ֣ים <S%H7657><s%> shiv-'Im were seventy נָ֑פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Na-fesh; souls וְיוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> ve-yo-Sef for Joseph הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah was in בְמִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> ve-mitz-Ra-yim. was in Egypt

וַיָּ֤מָת <S%H4191><s%> vai-Ya-mot died יוֹסֵף֙ <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef And Joseph וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all אֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav, and all his brethren וְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol and all הַדּ֥וֹר <S%H1755><s%> had-Dor and all that generation הַהֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu. he

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel פָּר֧וּ <S%H6509><s%> pa-Ru were fruitful וַֽיִּשְׁרְצ֛וּ <S%H8317><s%> vai-yish-re-Tzu and increased abundantly וַיִּרְבּ֥וּ <S%H7235><s%> vai-yir-Bu and multiplied וַיַּֽעַצְמ֖וּ <S%H6105><s%> vai-ya-'atz-Mu mighty בִּמְאֹ֣ד <S%H3966><s%> bim-'Od exceedingly מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od; exceedingly וַתִּמָּלֵ֥א <S%H4390><s%> vat-tim-ma-Le was filled הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz and the land אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H854><s%> 'o-Tam. for פ Peh

וַיָּ֥קָם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom Now there arose up מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king חָדָ֖שׁ <S%H2319><s%> cha-Dash a new עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; over Egypt אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not יָדַ֖ע <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da' which knew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יוֹסֵֽף׃ <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef. not Joseph

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to his עַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo; unto his people הִנֵּ֗ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh, Behold עַ֚ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am Behold the people בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel רַ֥ב <S%H7227><s%> rav [are] more וְעָצ֖וּם <S%H6099><s%> ve-'a-Tzum and mightier מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu. than

הָ֥בָה <S%H3051><s%> Ha-vah Come on נִֽתְחַכְּמָ֖ה <S%H2449><s%> nit-chak-ke-Mah let us deal wisely ל֑וֹ lo; פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- or יִרְבֶּ֗ה <S%H7235><s%> yir-Beh, with them lest they multiply וְהָיָ֞ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for תִקְרֶ֤אנָה <S%H7122><s%> tik-Re-nah and it come to pass that when there falleth out מִלְחָמָה֙ <S%H4421><s%> mil-cha-Mah any war וְנוֹסַ֤ף <S%H3254><s%> ve-no-Saf join גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- will also הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> hu they עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and שֹׂ֣נְאֵ֔ינוּ <S%H8130><s%> so-ne-'Ei-nu, also unto our enemies וְנִלְחַם־ <S%H3898><s%> ve-nil-cham- and fight בָּ֖נוּ Ba-nu וְעָלָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> ve-'a-Lah against us and [so] get them up מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. out of the land

וַיָּשִׂ֤ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> vai-ya-Si-mu Therefore they did set עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav over שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei captain מִסִּ֔ים <S%H4522><s%> mis-Sim, discomfited לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an because of עַנֹּת֖וֹ <S%H6031><s%> an-no-To to afflict בְּסִבְלֹתָ֑ם <S%H5450><s%> be-siv-lo-Tam; them with their burdens וַיִּ֜בֶן <S%H1129><s%> vai-Yi-ven And they built עָרֵ֤י <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rei cities מִסְכְּנוֹת֙ <S%H4543><s%> mis-ke-nOt treasure לְפַרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> le-far-'Oh, for Pharaoh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פִּתֹ֖ם <S%H6619><s%> pi-Tom Pithom וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et רַעַמְסֵֽס׃ <S%H7486><s%> ra-'am-Ses. and Raamses

וְכַאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> ve-cha-'a-Sher they יְעַנּ֣וּ <S%H6031><s%> ye-'an-Nu But the more they afflicted אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> ken them the more יִרְבֶּ֖ה <S%H7235><s%> yir-Beh they multiplied וְכֵ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> ve-Chen and the more יִפְרֹ֑ץ <S%H6555><s%> yif-Rotz; and grew וַיָּקֻ֕צוּ <S%H6973><s%> vai-ya-Ku-tzu And they were grieved מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei because בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיַּעֲבִ֧דוּ <S%H5647><s%> vai-ya-'a-Vi-du to serve מִצְרַ֛יִם <S%H4713><s%> mitz-Ra-yim Egyptian אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בְּפָֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H6531><s%> be-Fa-rech. with rigour

וַיְמָרְר֨וּ <S%H4843><s%> vay-ma-re-Ru bitter אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חַיֵּיהֶ֜ם <S%H2416><s%> chai-yei-Hem their lives בַּעֲבֹדָ֣ה <S%H5656><s%> ba-'a-vo-Dah bondage קָשָׁ֗ה <S%H7186><s%> ka-Shah, with hard בְּחֹ֙מֶר֙ <S%H2563><s%> be-Cho-mer in morter וּבִלְבֵנִ֔ים <S%H3843><s%> u-vil-ve-Nim, and in brick וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol all עֲבֹדָ֖ה <S%H5656><s%> 'a-vo-Dah and in all manner of service בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> bas-sa-Deh; in the field אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עֲבֹ֣דָתָ֔ם <S%H5656><s%> 'a-Vo-da-Tam, all their service אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which עָבְד֥וּ <S%H5647><s%> 'a-ve-Du wherein they made them serve בָהֶ֖ם va-Hem בְּפָֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H6531><s%> be-Fa-rech. [was] with rigour

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer spake מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech And the king מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt לַֽמְיַלְּדֹ֖ת <S%H3205><s%> lam-yal-le-Dot midwives הָֽעִבְרִיֹּ֑ת <S%H5680><s%> ha-'iv-ri-Yot; to the Hebrew אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher of whom שֵׁ֤ם <S%H8034><s%> shem of which the name הָֽאַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> ha-'a-Chat of the one שִׁפְרָ֔ה <S%H8236><s%> shif-Rah, [was] Shiphrah וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem and the name הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Nit of the other פּוּעָֽה׃ <S%H6326><s%> pu-'Ah. Puah

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, And he said בְּיַלֶּדְכֶן֙ <S%H3205><s%> be-yal-led-Chen When ye do the office of a midwife אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָֽעִבְרִיּ֔וֹת <S%H5680><s%> ha-'iv-ri-Yot, to the Hebrew women וּרְאִיתֶ֖ן <S%H7200><s%> u-re-'i-Ten and see עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon הָאָבְנָ֑יִם <S%H70><s%> ha-'a-ve-Na-yim; [them] upon the stools אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if בֵּ֥ן <S%H1121><s%> ben if it [be] a son הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> hu you וַהֲמִתֶּ֣ן <S%H4191><s%> va-ha-mit-Ten then ye shall kill אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- if בַּ֥ת <S%H1323><s%> bat him but if it [be] a daughter הִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> hi she וָחָֽיָה׃ <S%H2425><s%> va-Cha-yah. then she shall live

וַתִּירֶ֤אןָ <S%H3372><s%> vat-ti-Re-na feared הַֽמְיַלְּדֹת֙ <S%H3205><s%> ham-yal-le-Dot But the midwives אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָ֣אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, God וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and did not עָשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su, and did כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber commanded אֲלֵיהֶ֖ן <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hen as מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech not as the king מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt וַתְּחַיֶּ֖יןָ <S%H2421><s%> vat-te-chai-Yei-na alive אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיְלָדִֽים׃ <S%H3206><s%> hay-la-Dim. the men children

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra called מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- And the king מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt לַֽמְיַלְּדֹ֔ת <S%H3205><s%> lam-yal-le-Dot, for the midwives וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said לָהֶ֔ן la-Hen, מַדּ֥וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> mad-Du-a' unto them Why עֲשִׂיתֶ֖ן <S%H6213><s%> 'a-si-Ten have ye done הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh; this וַתְּחַיֶּ֖יןָ <S%H2421><s%> vat-te-chai-Yei-na alive אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיְלָדִֽים׃ <S%H3206><s%> hay-la-Dim. the men children

וַתֹּאמַ֤רְןָ <S%H559><s%> vat-to-Mar-na said הַֽמְיַלְּדֹת֙ <S%H3205><s%> ham-yal-le-Dot And the midwives אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh, unto Pharaoh כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki Because לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> lo not כַנָּשִׁ֛ים <S%H802><s%> chan-na-Shim women הַמִּצְרִיֹּ֖ת <S%H4713><s%> ham-mitz-ri-Yot [are] not as the Egyptian women הָֽעִבְרִיֹּ֑ת <S%H5680><s%> ha-'iv-ri-Yot; Because the Hebrew כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Because חָי֣וֹת <S%H2422><s%> cha-Yot for they [are] lively הֵ֔נָּה <S%H2007><s%> Hen-nah, in בְּטֶ֨רֶם <S%H2962><s%> be-Te-rem ere תָּב֧וֹא <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo come in אֲלֵהֶ֛ן <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hen and הַמְיַלֶּ֖דֶת <S%H3205><s%> ham-yal-Le-det and are delivered וְיָלָֽדוּ׃ <S%H3205><s%> ve-ya-La-du. the midwives

וַיֵּ֥יטֶב <S%H3190><s%> vai-Yei-tev dealt well אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him Therefore God לַֽמְיַלְּדֹ֑ת <S%H3205><s%> lam-yal-le-Dot; with the midwives וַיִּ֧רֶב <S%H7235><s%> vai-Yi-rev multiplied הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am and the people וַיַּֽעַצְמ֖וּ <S%H6105><s%> vai-ya-'atz-Mu mighty מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od. and waxed very

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Because יָֽרְא֥וּ <S%H3372><s%> ya-re-'U feared הַֽמְיַלְּדֹ֖ת <S%H3205><s%> ham-yal-le-Dot And it came to pass because the midwives אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him; God וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as that he made לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem בָּתִּֽים׃ <S%H1004><s%> bat-Tim. them houses

וַיְצַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> vay-Tzav charged פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh, And Pharaoh לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol all עַמּ֖וֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo all his people לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- Every הַבֵּ֣ן <S%H1121><s%> hab-Ben Every son הַיִּלּ֗וֹד <S%H3209><s%> hai-yil-Lod, that is born הַיְאֹ֙רָה֙ <S%H2975><s%> hay-'O-rah into the river תַּשְׁלִיכֻ֔הוּ <S%H7993><s%> tash-li-Chu-hu, ye shall cast וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and every הַבַּ֖ת <S%H1323><s%> hab-Bat and every daughter תְּחַיּֽוּן׃ <S%H2421><s%> te-chai-Yun. ye shall save alive ס sa-Mek
